about_the_game:
Waifu Fighter's original soundtrack, which includes 11 songs from the game.
This combination of rocking rhythms from around the world is sure to bring you back to the best moments of your battles with the baddest bitches born.

Track List:

01. Battle of the Sexes
02. Tourney of Supreme Warriors
03. Hold Your Breath
04. Instant Honor
05. Authentic Asian Flava
06. Ninjitsu: Bladed Beheading
07. Devil's Castle
08. Song of Fairies
09. The Locked Room
10. Heartwarming
11. Sublimation
12. Devil's Castle [Ver.1]
13. Battle of the Sexes [Story Ver.]
14. Jingle-Win&Lose

content_descriptors.notes:
The characters in this game are all adults.
It contains female nudity,pornographic content, mild violence,non-consensual sex and other adult content. Please pay attention to it and make sure you are in a suitable place before playing, so as not to cause trouble for others.
